channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1235; 05:29PM; 4815 S Roma Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZSTYmY; #Venice; It took 26 firefighters 24 minutes to extinguish a fire, which was contained mostly to the attic of a 4,601 sq-ft, three-story (portions had a 4th story) home in the "Silver Strand" tract, built in 1985. Firefighters took care to protect belongings below before applying water to the flames above. There were no injuries, and the cause is under investigation.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E62 E63 E67 RA62 T5 T63; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1243; 05:28PM; 22631 W Clarendon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43ayRiv; #WoodlandHills; Firefighters arrived to find that an exterior fire had extended into the attached garage of a one-story home. Twenty-four firefighters quickly extinguished the flames in 17 minutes, sparing the living space adjacent to the garage from any damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E106 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA84 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1243; 05:11PM; 22631 W Clarendon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43ayRiv; #WoodlandHills; One-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E106 E293 E305 E72 E84 RA84 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1235; 05:05PM; 4815 S Roma Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZSTYmY; #Venice; Three-story "boardwalk-style" home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E263 E63 E67 RA62 T63; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Fallen Tree; INC#1156; 04:50PM; 4838 N Sunnyslope Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40ZIiPV; #ShermanOaks; PRELIM: A tree has fallen onto an apartment building, causing damage significant enough to temporarily evacuate an unknown number of occupants from the structure until an L.A. City Department of Building & Safety (LADBS) Inspector (ETA 6:45 PM) can assess the damage. No injuries reported. Though our region has been experiencing strong wind, LAFD does not determine the specific cause of a tree falling. No further details. Media Inquires: LADBS and Property Owner (at scene).; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E278 T78; CH8; Brian Humphrey

COMPLETE - Cliff Rescue; INC#1239; 08:34PM; 2201 W Warmouth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/433gJY7; #SanPedro; Ground-based LAFD firefighters, including those specially trained and equipped for Urban Search and Rescue, were able to safely utilize a harness and rope system to safely access and lower the stranded though uninjured 52 year-old male - and his (unknown age/breed) pet dog, from the steep cliff behind his home, to the beach 30+ feet below. They will be assisted to walking to the cliff top and their home via a nearby trail.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA36 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88 + LACoFD Baywatch Lifeguards; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Cliff Rescue; INC#1239; 07:30PM; 2201 W Warmouth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/433gJY7; #SanPedro; LAFD land, air and sea rescuers are at scene. Plan A: ground-based LAFD firefighters, including those specially trained and equipped for Urban Search and Rescue, will commence ground-based rope rescue of the uninjured 52 year-old male, who remains stranded on a precarious seaside cliff behind his home. The current status of his dog, that he was attempting to rescue from the steep terrain, has yet to be determined.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA36 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88 + LACoFD Baywatch Lifeguards; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue; INC#1239; 07:02PM; 2201 W Warmouth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/433gJY7; San Pedro; PRELIM: LAFD land, air and sea response to an uninjured adult male resident who became stranded on a precarious seaside cliff behind his home during his attempt to rescue his dog (pet's current status undetermined).; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA36 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1371; 08:05PM; 1212 S Flower St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nvlDfY; Downtown; Firefighters are systemically clearing the smoke from each floor. There is no active fire. It appears there was a small fire in a trash chute which was extinguished by the automatic fire sprinklers. There are no injuries reported and no damage to the structure. There are no occupants displaced. No further details. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E203 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T3; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - High Rise; INC#1371; 07:41PM; 1212 S Flower St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nvlDfY; Downtown; 35 story hi rise building (residential over parking) with a water flow (sprinkler activation) on the 5th floor parking. Firefighters are checking for possible trash chute fire and investigating the residential floors for any smoke (smoke alarms activated in various areas of the building). There are no injuries reported. Firefighters are in the investigation mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E203 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T3; CH9; 13 15; Margaret Stewart
